bro can u tell me  which software you use to convert in dual audio

@askraj007
Actually you can make a video with several audio using MKVmerge.. Just convert the audio on your desired format (like AAC, AC3, DTS, ets..) and MKV merge will do the rest.. You can even add several subtitles (that you can turn on/off) if you want..
